Class PostgresNoticeboardDAO

java.lang.Object
daopostgresimplementation.PostgresNoticeboardDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
NoticeboardDAO
public class PostgresNoticeboardDAO extends Object implements NoticeboardDAO

PostgreSQL specific implementation of the NoticeboardDAO interface.

      Returns:

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      boards - a List object to load the Noticeboard objects into
      Returns:
      0 if successful, otherwise -1.
